item.title: Fumoir 10 Tiroir club
item.description:
SECTION: FUMOIR / ROOKZAAL Bruxelles 2008-2012
F10/12 15/01/2011
Guy Cardoso : Tiroir Club (+ MFA concert)

‘Meuble’ in situ incluant des tiroirs récupérés (ancienne pharmacie de la rue du Bailli) Bonus Concert du Messerli Free Arkestra

item.title: Fumoir 04 ORC
item.description:
SECTION: FUMOIR / ROOKZAAL Bruxelles 2008-2012 F04/12 25/07/2009
Odie Rynell Cash and a few rastarari abstracs
with “postponed indefinitely”
soundwork and text for consumption
time variable

incl additional contributions: Marc Rossignol, Sturm & Lie, Piotr Osuszkiewicz, Merzedes Sturm-Lie, Heinrich Obst & LL

item.title: Fumoir-Rookzaal (2008-2012)
item.description:
Patacycliste org archives (by DK) inclu. Laboratoires Patacyclistes 1992-1999 / Pistologie 1994-2017 / Bureau du Port 2000-2007 and Fumoir 2008-2012


FUMOIR / ROOKZAAL Bruxelles 2008-2012 variable happenings & open tribunes in DK atelier version II

chronologi

2008
Fumoir 01 - LL (L. Lambrecht) L’éveil à l’envers
Fumoir 02 - The 1.000.000 $ Pic-Nic
Fumoir 03 - MRCVE - J.Permentier - V.Trabalza

2009
Fumoir 04 - Odie Rynell CASH and a few Rastafari Abstracts
Fumoir 05 - Oô Myth ho.. Michel Clerbois/ Simulacrum Piotr Osuskiewicz
